overview:
Sandra is a UI/Flash Designer with 7+ years of experience in Visual Communication, Corporate Marketing Campaigns and Flash Animation. Highly skilled at leading cross functional projects across multiple media channels.

Sandra’s strength is to translate complex concepts via images. Understanding how people interpret visual information helps her convey the right message.

Living and working in several different countries, as well as being fluent in English, Spanish and Portuguese enables her to create projects that are linguistically and culturally appropriate for many different markets.
